sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' var ranges = [ { divider: 1e9, suffix: 'B' }, { divider: 1e6, suffix: 'M' }, { divider: 1e3, suffix: 'k' }, ]; function formatNumber(n) { for (var i = 0; i < ranges.length; i++) { if (n >= ranges[i].divider) { let newNumber = (n / ranges[i].divider).toFixed(2); let roundOffNumber = Math.abs(newNumber); return roundOffNumber.toString() + ranges[i].suffix; } } return n; } const InventoryInfo = props => { return (
Inventory Info
{' '}

Inventory Selected

{formatNumber(props.currentInventory)}/{formatNumber(props.totalInventory)}

Stores Selected

{formatNumber(props.selectedStores)}/{formatNumber(props.totalStores)}

Limit clearance
to few Stores

) } export default InventoryInfo
